EnableFemaleFarmerPregnancy.Description: Gender swapped (and gender neutrality) support for enabling a change of dialogue to reflect female farmer becoming pregnant when with Robin. Uses kdau's PregnancyRole and must also be enabled in the Robin Romance config.

Gender swapped (and gender neutrality) support for enabling a change of dialogue to reflect female farmer becoming pregnant when with Robin. Uses the Pregnancy Choice mod and must also be enabled in the Robin Romance config.
Changes certain dialogue to reflect the female farmer being pregnant when married to Robin.

enablebmtobf.Description: Must be selected for other config options to work. Allows changing of bachelors to bachelorettes.

enablebftobm.Description: Must be selected for other config options to work. Allows changing of bachelorettes into bachelors.

EnableVeronica.Description: Turn off if you disabled Veronica, otherwise leave on.

EnableRRomanceAdditionalDialogue.Description: Turn off if you disabled the RRomanceAdditionalDialogue in the Robin Romance mod, otherwise leave on.

DisableOnlyFamily.Description: Disables RRomance Additional Dialogue on family members of Robin. Highly suggested to not use unless there's a mod conflict.

DisableOnlyNonFamily.Description: Disables RRomance Additional Dialogue on non-family members of Robin. Highly suggested to not use unless there's a mod conflict.

EnableExpandedSupport.Description: Expanded will already work with this mod, but lore might not match up, especially in regards to Robin and Veronica. What this option does is make a few areas of Expanded conform to this mod (so Veronica will appear in place of Robin, Veronica's name will be used where it should be, etc.). If you experience errors with Expanded AND Robin or Veronica, disable this option.

14HeartFix.Description: Should fix issues with the 14 heart event occasionally crashing. If you still have issues with Robin's 14 heart event, turn this option off. The sound/music may sound off when cycling through options, whereas it'll play properly with this turned off. When turned off, the 14 heart event tends to crash if you cycle too fast or too much (usually on the third loop).

AbigailGS.Description: Changes Abigail to be referred to as male for anything The Robin Romance mod affects.

AlexGS.Description: Changes Alex to be referred to as female for anything The Robin Romance mod affects.

ElliotGS.Description: Changes Elliot to be referred to as female for anything The Robin Romance mod affects.

EmilyGS.Description: Changes Emily to be referred to as male for anything The Robin Romance mod affects.

HaleyGS.Description: Changes Haley to be referred to as male for anything The Robin Romance mod affects.

HarveyGS.Description: Changes Harvey to be referred to as female for anything The Robin Romance mod affects.

LeahGS.Description: Changes Leah to be referred to as male for anything The Robin Romance mod affects.

MaruGS.Description: Changes Maru to be referred to as male for anything The Robin Romance mod affects.

PennyGS.Description: Changes Penny to be referred to as male for anything The Robin Romance mod affects.

SamGS.Description: Changes Sam to be referred to as female for anything The Robin Romance mod affects.

SebastianGS.Description: Changes Sebastian to be referred to as female for anything The Robin Romance mod affects.

SebbyGS.Description: Changes Sebby to whatever user defines. Sebby is used by Robin towards Sebastian both within and outside of The Robin Romance Mod.

ShaneGS.Description: Changes Shane to be referred to as female for anything The Robin Romance mod affects.

ParentNoun.Description: Only works with [CP] Gender Neutrality Mod. The uncapitalized noun to which your farmer will be referred to. Examples include: parent, mother, father, guardian, progenitor, etc.

SubjectivePronoun.Description: Only works with [CP] Gender Neutrality Mod. The subjective pronoun to use. Examples include: he, she, they, etc.

CapitalSubjectivePronoun.Description: Only works with [CP] Gender Neutrality Mod. The capitalized subjective pronoun to use. Examples include: He, She, They, etc. Special Note: The first letter should be capitalized.

SpouseNoun.Description: Only works with [CP] Gender Neutrality Mod. The noun which people will use to describe your marital status. Examples: husband, wife, spouse, partner, etc.

Entries.Ram_y2: No offense, @. But {{MaruGS}}'s going to win the egg festival this year. I believe in him.#$b#Even if it's as if the universe itself wants only {{AbigailGS}} to win.$8
Sebastian and {{MaruGS}} were both so adorable when they each had their first dance.$1#$b#Time really flies.$0
{{SebastianGS}} and {{MaruGS}} were both so adorable when they each had their first dance.$1#$b#Time really flies.$0

Entries.Ram: I hope some of my 'surprises' don't scare {{MaruGS}} too much.
Once Veronica moved to town, I had decided to let her take over doing the Ice Sculpture.#$b#That didn't last long once I got a look at {{LeahGS}}'s plans. I just had to join in!$1
Entries.Ram_spouse: I can't talk right now, @. {{LeahGS}} and I need to concentrate to get our sculpture finished.$3#$e#Hey, wait...#$b#I just want you to know I'll be cheering you on while you ice fish. Have a good time, honey!$7
Entries.Ram_y2: Working with ice has always been a bit of a challenge. {{LeahGS}} sometimes makes it look too easy.

Entries.Ram: I always wanted to craft some fireworks myself.#$b#Everyone seems to believe I would blow my hand off with the stuff, however.$s#$e#It scares me when {{MaruGS}} had messed around with them before, but he's responsible enough that I can trust him to do what I can't.$h
Entries.Ram_spouse: I can't wait to watch the fireworks with you later, @.#$b#It's one of my favorite festivals to spend with you.$9

Entries.Ram: I don't know if I'm more excited that {{MaruGS}} finally let me see that invention he'd been working on, or to watch {{SebastianGS}} play.#$e#Make sure that you don't miss the band, @.
Entries.Ram_spouse: I think it's good that {{SebbyGS}} has a hobby that gets her out of the basement sometimes.#$b#I'll see you later for the concert, @.$h

Entries.ramGiftToLeah: Hi @!^ I hope you'll come by to visit soon, although {{LeahGS}} might not let you in if you haven't befriended him yet. I attached something that might help you with that!^ -Robin%item object 196 1 %%
Entries.summer_4_1: {{MaruGS}}'s birthday is coming up and I need some quartz in order to finish building his gift. If you could, please get me a piece of quartz.^ -Robin%item quest 751 %%

Entries.751: ItemDelivery/A gift for {{MaruGS}}/Robin would like a piece of quartz so she can finish building {{MaruGS}}'s gift./Deliver a quartz to Robin./Ram 80/-1/250/-1/true/Thanks so much, @!$1#$b#{{MaruGS}}'s gift is going to come out great with this!

Entries.NPC.cs.4001: Honey... You've made me so happy, I wanted to give you something special to show how much I love you.#$b#{{EmilyGS}} also said it'd give you some extra stamina, though it could be an old wives' tell.$6#$b#Care to see if it's true?$9
Entries.NPC.cs.4439: It's been so long since Sebastian and {{MaruGS}} were born. I wonder how it'll be for us this time with the new baby?$s
It's been so long since {{SebastianGS}} and Maru were born. I wonder how it'll be for us this time with the new baby?$s
Entries.NPC.cs.4449: Being a parent is annoying, sometimes...  I just don't feel like getting up. At least they're still too young to talk back like {{SebbyGS}}.$a

Entries.NPC.cs.4001: Honey... You've made me so happy, I wanted to give you something special to show how much I love you.#$b#{{EmilyGS}} also said it'd give you some extra stamina, though it could be an old wives' tell.$6#$b#Care to see if it's true?$9

Entries.MovieInvite_Spouse_Ram: That sounds romantic. I'll ask {{SebastianGS}} to babysit.$9#$b#Don't worry, she won't smoke while she babysits.$4

Changes.AcceptGift_(O)426: Oh, this will go perfect on the wonderful salads Leah makes!#$b#You can't beat something this fresh.#$b#Thanks, @.

Entries.AcceptGift_(O)426: Oh, this will go perfect on the wonderful salads {{LeahGS}} makes!#$b#You can't beat something this fresh.#$b#Thanks, @.

Entries.Wed6: Something people don't know about your grandpa was that he used to grow a small grove of pumpkins on the farm.#$b#A few days before Spirit's Eve, large pumpkins would show up at the doorstep of all the kid's houses.#$b#Sebby tried to act "cool," but he and {{MaruGS}} would end up laughing and giggling as they tried to decide what to carve.#$b# No one seems to realize it, but Sebby is actually a very adoring big brother towards {{MaruGS}}.$1
Entries.Wed10: I always thought my last kid would be {{MaruGS}}. But...#$b#I could see having another kid someday. What about you?$7
Entries.Thu4_inlaw_Maru: Hi, @. How are things with {{MaruGS}} and the farm?#$b#Will you need me to be constructing any extra rooms, or perhaps a custom crib?$1#$e#As long as you two are happy, then that's enough for me.$0
Entries.Fri8: {{MaruGS}} has been talking about working at the clinic a little too much for my tastes.#$b#Just between you and me, I don't think that's what he really wants. I hope he'll consider becoming an engineer instead.#$b#Maybe him and Sebastian will build a working robot one day!
Entries.Sun: I like {{LeahGS}}, but some of those "vegetable" concoctions he creates smell terrible!#$b#$4Don't tell him I said that.
Entries.Sun10: I'd like to build another house one day. A large one for you and me, with two guest bedrooms for Sebastian and {{MaruGS}}.#$b#I wonder if they'd be willing to spend some of the holidays with us. Would you be okay with that?
Entries.fall_Mon: #$1 RobinMaru#{{MaruGS}} likes gems. He uses them in his inventions.#$e#So how are you and {{MaruGS}} getting along?
Entries.fall_Wed_inlaw_Leah: Take good care of {{LeahGS}}, @.#$b#The house is a little lonelier now without him around, but seeing him so happy with you makes up for it.
Entries.summer_9: What kind of gift do you think I should get for {{MaruGS}}?#$b#I got it! I'll build him a rack to display some of his smaller inventions.
Entries.summer_10: I've got to gather some firewood for the Luau tomorrow. {{LeahGS}} and I have been growing some vegetables we'll be adding to the pot. Of course they won't be as tasty as yours!
Entries.fall_26: {{MaruGS}} and I built a few "contraptions." It'll get a good scare out of anyone brave enough to step into that maze.#$b#Don't tell {{MaruGS}}, but I snuck in a couple ones he didn't help with. That'll give him a good scare too.
Entries.mountain_23_21: I love the mountains. The fresh air and the view can't be beat!$1#$b#I also get to see {{MaruGS}} and Sebastian when I come up here.$0#$b#I miss living with them, but I think the way things are is probably for the best.$2
Entries.Town_51_92: I found a leftover egg from the egg hunt.#$b#Don't worry, it's not rotten, it's a plastic one.#$e#Let's open it up and see what's inside. Oh, just a slip of paper. I wonder if Pierre hid it for {{AbigailGS}} to find?#$e#Well good night!$1#$e#Huh? What did it say? Seemed like gibberish to me, maybe it wasn't Pierre but one of the Shadow People.#$e#It said: "Time to Close For now. a Vacant Shell Finds no peace."$2
Entries.SpouseStardrop: Honey... You've made me so happy, I wanted to give you something special to show how much I love you.#$b#{{EmilyGS}} also said it'd give you some extra stamina, though it could be an old wives' tell.$6#$b#Care to see if it's true?$9
Entries.divorced_Maru: {{MaruGS}} was crying through the night... We're all devastated...$s
Entries.married_Maru: I'm so happy for you and {{MaruGS}}.$h#$b#And I'm sure I'll still see him often now that he lives a little closer!$0#$b#Don't worry, I won't be the mother-in-law that stops by every day.$u

Entries.Wed6: Something people don't know about your grandpa was that he used to grow a small grove of pumpkins on the farm.#$b#A few days before Spirit's Eve, large pumpkins would show up at the doorstep of all the kid's houses.#$b#{{SebbyGS}} tried to act "cool," but she and Maru would end up laughing and giggling as they tried to decide what to carve.#$b# No one seems to realize it, but {{SebbyGS}} is actually a very adoring big sister towards Maru.$1
Entries.Fri: You've met my daughter {{SebastianGS}}, right? #$e#She's a little shy, but I'm sure she'll warm up to you if you're nice to her. She could probably use another friend right now.
Entries.Fri4: Even though we're divorced, Demetrius and {{SebastianGS}} still have a good relationship.#$b#I'm happy for them. It's nice to know that they still have a familial bond.
Entries.Fri8: Maru has been talking about working at the clinic a little too much for my tastes.#$b#Just between you and me, I don't think that's what she really wants. I hope she'll consider becoming an engineer instead.#$b#Maybe her and {{SebastianGS}} will build a working robot one day!
Entries.Sat4: Do you think {{SebastianGS}} would like a crab beanie? Probably not, huh?#$e#I might have been too obsessed with a certain Mermaid a long time ago.
Entries.Sun2: Did you know that {{SebastianGS}} almost burnt down our house one time? Left an old cigarette on her bed.
Entries.Sun10: I'd like to build another house one day. A large one for you and me, with two guest bedrooms for {{SebastianGS}} and Maru.#$b#I wonder if they'd be willing to spend some of the holidays with us. Would you be okay with that?
Entries.Fri_inlaw_Sebastian: I miss my {{SebbyGS}}... she was always a little misunderstood, but I believed in her.
Entries.Fri4_inlaw_Sebastian: {{SebastianGS}} told me she's trying to quit smoking! I'm really proud of her. Seems you're a good influence. I'm glad that you two found each other.
Entries.winter_Fri_inlaw_Sebastian: I think the farm life is really healthy for {{SebbyGS}}.
Entries.winter_10: {{SebastianGS}} likes to be alone for most of the day on her birthday. I wish she'd celebrate with us for more than a couple hours.
Entries.mountain_23_21: I love the mountains. The fresh air and the view can't be beat!$1#$b#I also get to see Maru and {{SebastianGS}} when I come up here.$0#$b#I miss living with them, but I think the way things are is probably for the best.$2
Entries.divorced_Sebastian: {{SebastianGS}}'s back in the basement... what happened between you two?$s
Entries.married_Sebastian: Oh, don't worry... these are tears of joy. I know {{SebastianGS}} will be very happy on %farm Farm!$h

Entries.Wed6: Something people don't know about your grandpa was that he used to grow a small grove of pumpkins on the farm.#$b#A few days before Spirit's Eve, large pumpkins would show up at the doorstep of all the kid's houses.#$b#{{SebbyGS}} tried to act "cool," but she and {{MaruGS}} would end up laughing and giggling as they tried to decide what to carve.#$b# No one seems to realize it, but {{SebbyGS}} is actually a very adoring big sister towards {{MaruGS}}.$1
Entries.Wed10: I always thought my last kid would be {{MaruGS}}. But...#$b#I could see having another kid someday. What about you?$7
Entries.Thu4_inlaw_Maru: Hi, @. How are things with {{MaruGS}} and the farm?#$b#Will you need me to be constructing any extra rooms, or perhaps a custom crib?$1#$e#As long as you two are happy, then that's enough for me.$0
Entries.Fri: You've met my daughter {{SebastianGS}}, right? #$e#She's a little shy, but I'm sure she'll warm up to you if you're nice to her. She could probably use another friend right now.
Entries.Fri4: Even though we're divorced, Demetrius and {{SebastianGS}} still have a good relationship.#$b#I'm happy for them. It's nice to know that they still have a familial bond.
Entries.Fri8: {{MaruGS}} has been talking about working at the clinic a little too much for my tastes.#$b#Just between you and me, I don't think that's what he really wants. I hope he'll consider becoming an engineer instead.#$b#Maybe him and {{SebastianGS}} will build a working robot one day!

Entries.Sun2: Did you know that {{SebastianGS}} almost burnt down our house one time? Left an old cigarette on her bed.
Entries.Sun10: I'd like to build another house one day. A large one for you and me, with two guest bedrooms for {{SebastianGS}} and {{MaruGS}}.#$b#I wonder if they'd be willing to spend some of the holidays with us. Would you be okay with that?
Entries.Fri_inlaw_Sebastian: I miss my {{SebbyGS}}... she was always a little misunderstood, but I believed in her.
Entries.Fri4_inlaw_Sebastian: {{SebastianGS}} told me she's trying to quit smoking! I'm really proud of her. Seems you're a good influence. I'm glad that you two found each other.
Entries.fall_Mon: #$1 RobinMaru#{{MaruGS}} likes gems. He uses them in his inventions.#$e#So how are you and {{MaruGS}} getting along?
Entries.fall_Wed_inlaw_Leah: Take good care of {{LeahGS}}, @.#$b#The house is a little lonelier now without him around, but seeing him so happy with you makes up for it.
Entries.summer_9: What kind of gift do you think I should get for {{MaruGS}}?#$b#I got it! I'll build him a rack to display some of his smaller inventions.
Entries.summer_10: I've got to gather some firewood for the Luau tomorrow. {{LeahGS}} and I have been growing some vegetables we'll be adding to the pot. Of course they won't be as tasty as yours!
Entries.fall_26: {{MaruGS}} and I built a few "contraptions." It'll get a good scare out of anyone brave enough to step into that maze.#$b#Don't tell {{MaruGS}}, but I snuck in a couple ones he didn't help with. That'll give him a good scare too.
Entries.winter_10: {{SebastianGS}} likes to be alone for most of the day on her birthday. I wish she'd celebrate with us for more than a couple hours.
Entries.mountain_23_21: I love the mountains. The fresh air and the view can't be beat!$1#$b#I also get to see {{MaruGS}} and {{SebastianGS}} when I come up here.$0#$b#I miss living with them, but I think the way things are is probably for the best.$2
Entries.Town_51_92: I found a leftover egg from the egg hunt.#$b#Don't worry, it's not rotten, it's a plastic one.#$e#Let's open it up and see what's inside. Oh, just a slip of paper. I wonder if Pierre hid it for {{AbigailGS}} to find?#$e#Well good night!$1#$e#Huh? What did it say? Seemed like gibberish to me, maybe it wasn't Pierre but one of the Shadow People.#$e#It said: "Time to Close For now. a Vacant Shell Finds no peace."$2
Entries.divorced_Sebastian: {{SebastianGS}}'s back in the basement... what happened between you two?$s
Entries.divorced_Maru: {{MaruGS}} was crying through the night... We're all devastated...$s
Entries.married_Sebastian: Oh, don't worry... these are tears of joy. I know {{SebastianGS}} will be very happy on %farm Farm!$h
Entries.married_Maru: I'm so happy for you and {{MaruGS}}.$h#$b#And I'm sure I'll still see him often now that he lives a little closer!$0#$b#Don't worry, I won't be the mother-in-law that stops by every day.$u

Entries.Rainy_Day_1: I want to invite Sebastian and {{MaruGS}} over one of these days. It'd be nice for the four of us to have dinner together.
Entries.Rainy_Day_4: When they were young, {{MaruGS}} loved a rainy day.#$b#It meant he was able to avoid the outdoors and stay inside to tinker with his gadgets.#$b#But Sebastian was just like me. We liked to sit and watch out the window as the rain drops slowly ran down it.#$b#I'm glad I have someone to watch the raindrops with again.$1
Entries.Indoor_Day_3: I'm going to call Sebastian and {{MaruGS}} today. It's good to check in with them every once in a while.
Entries.Indoor_Night_1: I'm glad you're home, @. {{EmilyGS}} designed a little something for me and dropped it off today.#$b#Once you're settled in for the night, I'd love to show you what he gave me!$9
Entries.TwoKids_1: Sebastian and {{MaruGS}} are coming by to say hi to their little brother and sister.#$b#I think they are really getting along.#$b#I never thought I'd have this large of a family, but I couldn't be happier!
Entries.TwoKids_3: We should take the kids on a picnic one of these days.#$b#I'll call {{MaruGS}} and Sebastian to join us. It can be a family outing!#$b#You'll bring a rhubarb pie? Well, I guess that'd be good.#$b#{{MaruGS}} will love it.#$b#*mumbles* Well, I do like rhubarb, too.$2#$b#Why'd you kiss me on the cheek? I was too adorable? You sure know how to flatter a woman, don't you?$7
Entries.Good_6: {{EmilyGS}} has been teaching me how to meditate for a while, but I think I stumbled on something new.#$b#I was dreaming last night that I was making a wood sculpture. Suddenly I found myself in "control" of the dream.#$b#When I looked closer at the sculpture, I noticed it was of you.#$b#You showed up behind me and took my hands, then pulled me in for a kiss. It was wonder-$9#$b#Hey, I was still talking! But I'll forgive you.$7#$b#That was nice. Your kiss will linger on my lips all day.$7
Entries.funLeave_Ram: I'm going to do some work at Marnie's today, then I'll be popping over to see Sebastian and {{MaruGS}}. I'll see you later tonight when I get home, alright?
Entries.funReturn_Ram: It was fun to meet up with {{MaruGS}} and Sebastian. Their lives seem to be going well. I'll make dinner for us tonight, alright honey?

Entries.Rainy_Day_1: I want to invite {{SebastianGS}} and Maru over one of these days. It'd be nice for the four of us to have dinner together.
Entries.Rainy_Day_3: I'm glad you and {{SebastianGS}} are getting along. I wasn't sure if she'd be okay with having yet another stepparent.

Entries.DesertFestival_Ram: Do you think {{LeahGS}} would appreciate a cactus? It would *spruce* up the place.$4#$b#Sorry, sorry. It's just some woodworking humor.$1

Entries.Sun6: One of the reasons I love carpentry is because it lets my mind wander.#$b#Even if my thoughts tend to be heavy, when I get out to work with the wood, I can just release my stress and focus on something other than the negativity that likes to weigh me down.#$e#Haha, yeah that last bit sounds like {{EmilyGS}} might be rubbing off on me.$2

Entries.Tue4_inlaw_Ram: It's strange to have a stepparent now. I guess this must be how {{SebastianGS}} felt for so long.$s

Entries.fall_Fri6: {{SebastianGS}} asked me for help the other day on a project she was working on.#$b#I know. I couldn't believe it either.$h

Entries.Mon8:

Entries.secretSeb_listen: Demetrius is a really nice guy. Even though he's divorced from mom, he treats me like he treats {{MaruGS}}.$u
Entries.secretSebquestion_followup:
$p 37155
										#I got Demetrius to test out one of the programs I'd written. Compared to mom, there was way less trouble involved.
										|Hey, @.$s
Entries.Fri6: Mom moving out is such a pain. Now every-time she has a computer problem, I have to go all the way over to {{LeahGS}}'s to fix it.$a#$b#And if you thought maybe I should try helping her over the phone, then I suggest you give that a try yourself and see how well it goes.$h

Entries.winter_Tue6: Do you remember when I told you about mom throwing away my old comic collection?#$b#Well, it was awhile ago. But what's important is that they showed up out of the blue the other day.#$b#I think {{MaruGS}} may have grabbed them from the trash and kept them safe for me.#$b#Even if he's not saying anything about it.$s

Entries.NPC.cs.4439: It's been so long since {{SebastianGS}} and Maru were born. I wonder how it'll be for us this time with the new baby?$s
Entries.NPC.cs.4449: Being a parent is annoying, sometimes...  I just don't feel like getting up. At least they're still too young to talk back like {{SebbyGS}}.$a

Entries.NPC.cs.4439: It's been so long since Sebastian and {{MaruGS}} were born. I wonder how it'll be for us this time with the new baby?$s

Entries.stardrop_gift: Honey... You've made me so happy, I wanted to give you something special to show how much I love you.#$b#{{EmilyGS}} also said it'd give you some extra stamina, though it could be an old wives' tell.$6#$b#Care to see if it's true?$9

Entries.mountain_28_24: I love the mountains. The fresh air and the view can't be beat!$1#$b#I also get to see Maru and {{SebastianGS}} when I come up here.$0#$b#I miss living with them, but I think the way things are is probably for the best.$2

I love the mountains. The fresh air and the view can't be beat!$1#$b#I also get to see {{MaruGS}} and Sebastian when I come up here.$0#$b#I miss living with them, but I think the way things are is probably for the best.$2
Entries.Town_51_90: I found a leftover egg from the egg hunt.#$b#Don't worry, it's not rotten, it's a plastic one.#$e#Let's open it up and see what's inside. Oh, just a slip of paper. I wonder if Pierre hid it for {{AbigailGS}} to find?#$e#Well good night!$1#$e#Huh? What did it say? Seemed like gibberish to me, maybe it wasn't Pierre but one of the Shadow People.#$e#It said: "Time to Close For now. a Vacant Shell Finds no peace."$2

Entries.fall_Tue4: Veronica is the "fun" aunt. At least for {{SebastianGS}}, but we have very little in common.#$b#Still, she supports me where others often don't.$s

Entries.pamHouseUpgradeAnonymous: @, did you hear? Someone paid Veronica to build Pam and {{PennyGS}} a house! Veronica won't tell me who it was, though.#$e#Regardless of who paid, I love seeing this kind of community support in Pelican Town!$h

Entries.15389722/j 57: springtown/62 93/farmer 54 94 1 Lewis 62 94 0 Robin 64 93 3/skippable/move farmer 6 0 1 true/animate Robin false true 100 24 25 26 27 27 27 27 27 27 27 27/pause 200/playSound crafting/pause 1200/playSound crafting/pause 1200/playSound crafting/pause 1200/playSound crafting/pause 500/stopAnimation Robin/faceDirection Lewis 3/speak Lewis "Ah, hello there, @. You showed up at the perfect time.$h"/pause 500/emote farmer 8/move farmer 1 0 0 true/faceDirection Lewis 0/pause 200/speak Lewis "It's our new 'Special Orders' board.#$b#Veronica and I built it from scratch.$h"/pause 500/speak Robin "Um... Lewis? All you did was hold the nails."/pause 300/showFrame Lewis 26/playSound slimedead/jump Lewis/shake Lewis 1000/pause 1300/showFrame Lewis 12/faceDirection farmer 1/faceDirection Lewis 3/speak Lewis "*Ahem*... Ignore her.$5"/pause 400/faceDirection Lewis 0/speak Lewis "Now, let me explain..."/showFrame Lewis 20/speak Lewis "You see... with %farm Farm back in business, the local economy has really been picking up.#$b#As a result, some of the local townsfolk have been asking me for a way to source local ingredients for their businesses or personal projects."/pause 200/showFrame Lewis 8/faceDirection Lewis 0/speak Lewis "So, Veronica and I came up with the idea of a new 'Special Orders' board, where people can post bigger jobs than would make sense for the old billboard outside Pierre's."/faceDirection farmer 0/pause 500/faceDirection Robin 3/move Robin 0 1 3/speak Robin "Yeah... for example, I plan on requesting some hardwood for a bed I want to make.$h#$b#I won't put you on the spot, but if you want to help me out you can just accept the job from this board.#$b#Who knows, maybe if the bed turns out well I'll start selling them in my shop!$h"/faceDirection farmer 1/quickQuestion #I look forward to helping!#Heh... I dunno... we'll see...(break)faceDirection Lewis 3\speak Lewis "I thought so! I wouldn't expect anything less from you, @."\emote Robin 20\speak Robin "So, can we say that you're... --On Board--?$4"\pause 400\showFrame Lewis 27\shake Lewis 200\pause 400\textAboveHead Lewis "*groan*"\animate Robin false true 150 32 33\pause 1200\showFrame Lewis 0\faceDirection Lewis 3\speak Lewis "Well, I'm sure you're busy, so we won't keep you away from your work any longer.#$b#As always, I appreciate your willingness to contribute!$h#$b#Take care, @."(break)faceDirection Lewis 3\emote Lewis 28\speak Lewis "Huh... I wouldn't expect such a tepid response from you, @. I'm disappointed.$s"\pause 400\speak Robin "It's fine, Lewis... there's no pressure to help out.$5#$b#Maybe I can get {{SebastianGS}} to help. She could use some work away from the computer."\playMusic none\pause 500\speak Lewis "Hmmph... Well, we're done here, Veronica.$u#$b#...Wouldn't want to waste any more of @'s precious 'me' time.$u"\faceDirection Lewis 1(break)/pause 2000/end

Entries.Robin: {{SebastianGS}} was so cute when she was younger, she used to love the egg hunt. Then she started throwing rotten eggs...#$e#They can't stay that age forever, I guess.$2

Entries.Fri: You've met my niece {{SebastianGS}}, right? She lives downstairs.#$e#She's a little shy, but I'm sure she'll warm up to you if you're nice to her.
Entries.Fri_inlaw_Sebastian: I miss {{SebastianGS}}... Feels a little less like home now.
Entries.Fri4: #$1 RobinSeb#I found an ashtray in {{SebastianGS}}'s room, and it smelled really weird. Should I be worried about this?#$e#Sometimes I worry about {{SebastianGS}}... she doesn't have many friends and doesn't really seem to care about her future very much...#$e#I would talk to her about it, but she never opens up to me.
Entries.Fri4_inlaw_Sebastian: {{SebastianGS}} told me she's trying to quit smoking! I'm really proud of her.
Entries.Fri6: Do you think {{SebastianGS}} would let me sit in on one of those games she plays with {{SamGS}}?#$b#Hmm, maybe not. Most people probably don't want their aunt playing those kinds of games with them.$2#$b#Oh, @, you and I should play a game like that sometime. It might be fun.$1
Entries.winter_Fri_inlaw_Sebastian: I think the farm life is really healthy for {{SebastianGS}}.
Entries.winter_9: You probably already know, but {{SebastianGS}} is a huge Star Fighters fan.#$b#She gets that from me, actually. I'm the one who introduced her to it.$1
Entries.winter_9_inlaw_Sebastian: How's Robin been treating you since the marriage?#$b#She's always been overprotective when it comes to {{SebastianGS}}, so you can always come complain to me if your mother-in-law is getting on your nerves.

Entries.pamHouseUpgrade: Our little plan worked out well, don't you think? Pam and {{PennyGS}} seem really happy.
Entries.pamHouseUpgradeAnonymous: Our little plan worked out well, don't you think? Pam and {{PennyGS}} seem really happy.
Entries.fall_Mon: #$1 RobinMaru#{{MaruGS}} likes gems. He uses them in his inventions.#$e#So how are you and {{MaruGS}} getting along?
Entries.summer_9: Robin's had a hard time understanding why {{MaruGS}} wants to become a nurse.#$b#Although if he really wants to be a nurse, I'm sure Robin will come around to supporting that choice.$4
Entries.summer_9_inlaw_Maru: You must be very special to my nephew. After all, he had such a huge focus on...#$b#Well, that's all in the past, so I guess that's not something for me to comment on anymore.$0#$b#Don't worry though, he loves you so much that he's all but forgotten that obsession.$1

Entries.GreenRain: This rain is crazy. I feel like we're in a scifi movie, exploring a strange new planet.#$b#*sigh*I want to go help Demetrius collect samples, but Robin would kill me if I didn't stay with {{SebastianGS}} and {{MaruGS}}.$s%noturn
Entries.divorced_Sebastian: {{SebastianGS}} moved back into the basement... I'm still having a hard time believing it.$s
Entries.divorced_Maru: {{MaruGS}} was crying through the night... Perhaps he'll be better off in the end, though.$s
Entries.married_Sebastian: Ugh, I'm just as much of a crybaby as my sister.$s#$b#Just ignore these tears of joy. I know {{SebastianGS}} will be very happy on %farm Farm!$h
Entries.married_Maru: We'll all miss having {{MaruGS}} around the house, but I'm sure we'll still see him often!

Entries.GreenRain: This rain is crazy. I feel like we're in a scifi movie, exploring a strange new planet.#$b#*sigh*I want to go help Demetrius collect samples, but Robin would kill me if I didn't stay with Sebastian and {{MaruGS}}.$s%noturn
Entries.divorced_Maru: {{MaruGS}} was crying through the night... Perhaps he'll be better off in the end, though.$s
Entries.married_Maru: We'll all miss having {{MaruGS}} around the house, but I'm sure we'll still see him often!

Entries.GreenRain: This rain is crazy. I feel like we're in a scifi movie, exploring a strange new planet.#$b#*sigh*I want to go help Demetrius collect samples, but Robin would kill me if I didn't stay with {{SebastianGS}} and Maru.$s%noturn
Entries.divorced_Sebastian: {{SebastianGS}} moved back into the basement... I'm still having a hard time believing it.$s
Entries.married_Sebastian: Ugh, I'm just as much of a crybaby as my sister.$s#$b#Just ignore these tears of joy. I know {{SebastianGS}} will be very happy on %farm Farm!$h
